summary: Robert Metzke, Global Head of Sustainability, spoke with us about Philips' continued efforts to embed sustainability and climate action in healthcare delivery. Underpinned by innovation, digitalization and collaboration, Philips’ efforts to drive sustainable healthcare are based on energy efficiency, resource efficiency and care pathway optimization.

Burger King has been a leader in incorporating plant-based meat into its menu, recognizing its potential as a sustainable and delicious option.

title: Textiles 2030 announces second annual progress report - UKFT
summary: Textiles 2030 is a UK voluntary agreement for collaborative climate action in the fashion and textiles industry. In the first two years, 130 businesses have signed up to the agreement, and the collective carbon footprint has decreased by 2%, while the water footprint has increased by 8%.
